item.description:
The Concord Metrowest Singles Meetup is going to the beach Saturday at Salisbury State Beach...we will be meeting after 10 AM and plan to bring games and just enjoy each other's company. Hope you can join us! If the weather is good we will make a day of it and maybe get dinner or find a nice pub later. You can rsvp here or at the other site. More detailed info is available here:
http://singles.meetup...
Don't forget suntan lotion!!! I'm planning on a good day!!! :-)
If you are planning to come later just let me know so I'll be watching for you...
AND Feel free to bring friends if you like, the more the merrier.
Sandy

$7.50 per car at entrance
item.name: You're invited.... Beach on Saturday!
